# Lab 13 - stateful set
1. 
```
NAME               READY   STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
pod/app-python-0   1/1     Running   0          7m21s
pod/app-python-1   1/1     Running   0          97s

NAME                          READY   AGE
statefulset.apps/app-python   2/2     7m23s

NAME                 TYPE           CLUSTER-IP    EXTERNAL-IP   PORT(S)          AGE
service/app-python   LoadBalancer   10.100.1.89   <pending>     5000:32415/TCP   7m23s
service/kubernetes   ClusterIP      10.96.0.1     <none>        443/TCP          7m36s

NAME                                        STATUS   VOLUME                                     CAPACITY   ACCESS MODES   STORAGECLASS   AGE
persistentvolumeclaim/visits-app-python-0   Bound    pvc-c20377c0-c84f-43ec-b9f9-d0d062b38b20   1Gi        RWO            standard       7m21s
persistentvolumeclaim/visits-app-python-1   Bound    pvc-20192b00-abe2-4c90-b62e-80be5cf83dd9   1Gi        RWO            standard       97s
```

3. The output of commands are different because pods contain their own files. And load balancer sends request to them in Round Robin fashion. That's why outputs are different

4. Ordering guarantee is unnecessary because each of the pods is independent and can process user request.
